mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply_${b_name} ( reply , regdate , updatedate , ref , reply_step , bno , id ) VALUES ( #{reply} , now() , now() , 0 , 0 , #{bno} , #{id} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.rno ,r.reply ,r.regdate ,r.updatedate ,r.ref ,r.reply_step ,r.bno ,r.id ,m.grade ,m.name FROM reply_${cri.b_name} r INNER JOIN member m ON r.id = m.id WHERE r.bno = #{bno} ORDER BY r.ref desc, r.reply_step asc
